alert.note: Alert for Adams (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:57PM MDT until August 03 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 457 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Leader, or 30 miles south of Fort Morgan, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Leader. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
